name: Blackout!!!
description:
-----------------------------GAMEPLAY-----------------------

As the city electrician, it is your job to fix the electricity in the buildings of the city before time runs out in this retro inspired arcade-like game.

The more houses you fix the more points you get.

Everytime you play you have a chance to get one of 3 maps to play on.

----------------------------CONTROLS-------------------------

Move with Arrow Keys or WASD

Space or Enter to fix buildings depending on mini-game

Yellow Apartments: Time Button Press in the Yellow(if miss lose 5 points)

-------------------------EXTRA DETAILS---------------------

A game I made with my brother for the MiniJam 73: Power

You play as an electrician trying to fix all of the houses in town.

It is missing a few quality of life things so It will be updated within the next 2 days

-----------------------------OTHER--------------------------
